item.title: Freelist Memory Buffer Allocator
item.description: In modern computer systems, memory is one of the most precious and constrained resources â€” a limitation that’s especially pronounced in the era of artificial intelligence. In the domain of on-device training, memory bottleneck have become one of the hardest obstacle to overcome; neural networks are notoriously memory hungry, especially during backpropagation, which involves storing and manipulating large amounts of intermediate data. Devices with 8GB RAM often struggle to survive, and the situation is even more dire for smaller, resource-constrained hardware.
